DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE : RESTAURANTS / RETAIL
DOC.TEXT: Fans Grilled : Tonya Harding , who is now in Lillehammer , Norway , for the Olympics , is " skating on thin ice , " according to 75 % of sports fans interviewed recently by the National Sports Grill in Buena Park . The typical response as_to whether Harding should be allowed to compete alongside Nancy Kerrigan : " Hell no. "
